original_title: The Best of Bob Hope: 50 years of Laughter Volume 2
overview: This Bob Hope Special called “Highlights of a Quarter Century” begins his 26th year with NBC in 1975 (he began with NBC radio in 1937) celebrating 25 years of Bob Hope Specials and the many celebrities that appeared on them The clips begin with his very first special, for Frigidaire, on April 9, 1950 and putting his way through the years to 1975
title: The Best of Bob Hope: 50 years of Laughter Volume 2
